desc_first_part: Passionate about web development, I'm currently looking for a work-study program for the JavaScript React application developer training with OpenClassrooms, I like to experiment, discover and learn new technologies, that's why I'm taking this training.
desc_second_part: Creative, rigorous and with excellent know-how, I have a good knowledge of React, I really like my job and I like to update my knowledge. Wishing to invest myself in a position that corresponds to my aspirations, I would like to be able to explain my motivations to you during an interview.
